metadata.title: CVE-2024-30161 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Qt 6.5.4, 6.5.5, and 6.6.2, QNetworkReply header data might be accessedvia a dangling pointer in Qt for WebAssembly (wasm). (Earlier and laterversions are unaffected.)

criterions.comment: qtbase-opensource-src package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
qtbase-opensource-src-gles package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
